mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.fid AS "fid", a.path AS "path", a.cc AS "cc", a.px AS "px", a.type AS "type", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.alias AS "alias", a.content AS "content", a.attach_file AS "attachFile", a.bxlx AS "bxlx", a.sjhqdx AS "sjhqdx", a.tzlj AS "tzlj", a.memo AS "memo", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bckj_dic_menu a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

SELECT
FROM bckj_dic_menu a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_dic_menu( owid, fid, path, cc, px, type, code, name, alias, content, attach_file, bxlx, sjhqdx, tzlj, memo, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{fid}, #{path}, #{cc}, #{px}, #{type}, #{code}, #{name}, #{alias}, #{content}, #{attachFile}, #{bxlx}, #{sjhqdx}, #{tzlj}, #{memo}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_dic_menu SET owid = #{owid}, fid = #{fid}, path = #{path}, cc = #{cc}, px = #{px}, type = #{type}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, alias = #{alias}, content = #{content}, attach_file = #{attachFile}, bxlx = #{bxlx}, sjhqdx = #{sjhqdx}, tzlj = #{tzlj}, memo = #{memo}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
